description: Alterations to the shop front of the ground floor, south facing shop unit (located beneath the approved office uses on floors 1-5 above).
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All new external work shall be carried out in materials of such colour or texture and with architectural detailing to match the existing facing work of the building. 

REASON: To ensure that the Local Planning Authority may be satisfied with the external appearance of the building to comply with Policies D4 (Designing in context), D11 (Alterations and extensions), D13 (Shopfronts), of Islington Council's Unitary Development Plan (2002) and Core Strategy (2011) Policies CS8 (Enhancing Islington’s Character), CS9 (Preserving and Enhancing Islington’s Built and Historic Environment) and Islington’s Shopfront Design Guide.
